examples.example: 只要我们每天努力一点，未来就会变得更加美好。

translate.english: As long as we work a little harder every day, the future will become even better.

examples.example: 我每天进步一点，就离梦想更近一点。

translate.english: I make a little progress every day, and I will be a little closer to the dream.

examples.example: 只要我们每天进步一点，生活就会增添一点光彩。

translate.english: As long as we make a little progress every day, life will add a little luster.
